name: Idle Medieval Tycoon - Clicker
description:
Welcome to your kingdom great King!

Become medieval tycoon by managing your kingdom for idle profit!
Grow your empire and make it even greater with advisors who will help you to manage it.
Take on the challenge and start discovering your incredible kingdom now!

FEATURES:
• Build new buildings and level them up to increase your idle profit.
• Collect idle cash even when you're offline!
• Make smart decisions to boost your economy.
• Hire advisors to increase your buildings income.
• Develop new technologies and earn even more!
• Catch goblins that take over your people.
• Use Crystal Ball to increase your idle gold!
• Collect achievements and receive gems.
• Complete daily quests to claim rewards.
• Discover new lands and make them profitable!
• No internet connection needed!

Join Idle Medieval Tycoon's Discord community!
https://discord.gg/DSKxVpd

HAVE FUN!
